div1.p: Your Draft in favour of J. T. Wilkinson for 3000 lb of lead I have paid—and have Aliso paid him a Due Bill in favour of Burges for 240 lb of lead—which Mr Wilkinson told me that you promised to give him; but if it does not meet you[r] approbation he is to Endorse it on a Receipt which I give him—he is to Settle with you the hawling of the Same—
I Enclose you a Letter—which I received from Mr Kerr you will bee so good as to give him an answer
I send you the Accot of the lead sent in since I have been Sick
I have paid Mr Mitchel the 566 lb Lead—
